wholly owned subsidiary of the Company, has entered into multiple Renewable Power Agreements under the Group
Captive, which will secure 127 MW of renewable power through solar and wind energy. The commissioning of these
Renewable power plants is expected to be in FY25 & FY26
The company has provided an impact of Rs 84 Cr (Pre-tax Rs 113 Cr) on account of one-time provision being created
